subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Bayern Munich team that lost 3-1 in Portugal was virtually the same one that routed Porto 6-1. But its winner-take-all mentality won the day.
snippet: The Bayern Munich team that lost 3-1 in Portugal was virtually the same one that routed Porto 6-1. But its winner-take-all mentality won the day.
